```{r load}
library(rio)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
library(forcats)
library(tidyverse)

rstats <- import(here("data", "rstats_tweets.rds"))
View(rstats)
```

```{r}

rstats <- rstats %>% 
  select(screen_name, created_at, status_id) %>% 
  # mutate(status_id = as.numeric(status_id)) %>% 
  # group_by(screen_name) %>% 
  count(screen_name) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  mutate(screen_name = as.factor(screen_name)) %>% 
  slice(1:25)

rstats2 <- rstats %>% 
  mutate(screen_name = fct_reorder(screen_name, n))
  
ggplot(rstats2, aes(screen_name, n)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip()

```
